column5: if anyone have any questions about fishing the Ottawa River Ontario,Canada don't be shy to send me an e-mail.

Hi BenI'll be moving to the Ottawa area in the next little while, and hope to relocate in a home on the Ottawa or some other waterbody in that area. I could sure use any advice or expertise that you have as I'm unfamiliar with fishing your area for "eyes".We've been looking at waterfront properties on the Ottawa between Ottawa and Castleford. Am I nuts?ThanksTaurcan
